document_data.name: Shining Order
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shining Order''' were a group of [[knight]]s who fought against [[Morag|Morag's]] invasion of their [[Planet|homeworld]] [[Azallah]] and their city [[Sahaladar]] in the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].
document_data.Activities: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Shining Order sent out [[Asheera]], a [[paladin]], and five other people into the [[demiplane]] inside the [[Source Stone]] to stop Morag's invasion of their world. All but Asheera died during this mission. After meeting the [[Hero of Neverwinter]], Asheera returned to her world probably hoping that the Hero would stop Morag.
document_data.History: The Shining Order was formed sometime before the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR.
document_data.Members: * Asheera: paladin and leader of an expedition to stop the queen of the old one's, Morag
